Classify lines

Source: R/diff.R
classify_lines.Rd

-: line appears in base, but not in head (was deleted) +: line appears in head, but not in base (was added) ++: line was added, but does not appear in either head or base it indicates a line that did not exist in either parent and was introduced by the merge resolution itself @: hunk header

Usage

classify_lines(raw_diff_df)

Arguments

raw_diff_df

(tibble) a raw diff tibble with a single column named `raw

Value

a tibble with 5 additional columns, all logical, classifying the rows into:

  • hunk:

  • base: present only in base (deleted)

  • head: present only in head (added)

  • merge: present neither in head nor in base

  • context: present both in head and in base
